price: 26. Boqortooyada Maalintaas waxaa run ahaan iska leh (Alle) Raxmaanka, oo maalin daran bay u ahaan gaalada.
arabic: ٱلۡمُلۡكُ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلۡحَقُّ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِۚ وَكَانَ يَوۡمًا عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَسِيرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: al-mul'ku yawma-idhin al-ḥaqu lilrraḥmāni wakāna yawman ʿalā al-kāfirīna ʿasīran
